recipe.title: Old Fashioned Lemonade
ingredients: 4 cups fresh lemon juice (about 24 lemons), strained
instructions: Pour the strained lemon juice into a large container. Add water and sugar, then stir until the sugar dissolves. Pack in an insulated drink cooler or Thermos. Serve the lemonade in glasses over ice garnished with a lemon slice. Makes 3 quarts without ice.
